title: Arabic 23
text: To the eternal I call thee, yet thou dost seek that which perisheth. What hath made thee turn away from Our desire and seek thine own?
teaser: To the eternal I call thee...

prev.title: Arabic 22
prev.text: Noble have I created thee, yet thou hast abased thyself. Rise then unto that for which thou wast created.

next.title: Arabic 24
next.text: Transgress not thy limits, nor claim that which beseemeth thee not. Prostrate thyself before the countenance of thy God, the Lord of might and power.
